content:
I don't have personal experiences, but i can suggest some great tv shows that are available on tv.com, based on popular opinion and critical acclaim: 

1. the twilight zone 
2. csi: crime scene investigation
3. elementary 
4. under the dome 
5. star trek: the next generation 
6. the good wife 
7. the amazing race 
8. survivor 
9. the late show with stephen colbert 
10. the late late show with james corden 

these shows have been praised for their compelling storytelling, memorable characters, and overall entertainment value. but feel free to check out tv.com's selection and browse different genres until you find a show that speaks to you. enjoy!
